title: Ownership and personal use of tablet computers 2012 , by country
summary: The statistic shows the Ownership of video on demand the TV in tablet computers as of October 2012 .
In the Spain , 24 percentage of respondents stated they used video-on-demand use .
By contrast , only 10 percentage of respondents in Germany stated that they use similar .
gold: This statistic shows the percentage of tablet computer ownership and usage among the populations of selected countries as of September 2012.
In the U.S. tablet ownership and usage was found to be at 20 percent of the population .
